abstract: Robert McCann, the head of brokerage at Merrill Lynch, has reportedly announced his plans to leave the securities firm, just days after its acquisition by Bank of America was completed.
snippet: Robert McCann, the head of brokerage at Merrill Lynch, has reportedly announced his plans to leave the securities firm, just days after its acquisition by Bank of America was completed.
lead_paragraph: Robert McCann, the head of brokerage at Merrill Lynch, has reportedly announced his plans to leave the securities firm, just days after its acquisition by Bank of America was completed.

headline.main: Merrill Brokerage Chief McCann to Leave

abstract: Bank of America has named Dan Sontag to head Merrill Lynch Global Wealth Management, its retail brokerage unit, according to an internal memo.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has named Dan Sontag to head Merrill Lynch Global Wealth Management, its retail brokerage unit, according to an internal memo.

headline.main: Successor Named for Merrill’s Brokerage Chief
